title: Easiest Ever Chili
directions: Brown ground beef with Recipe Ready Chopped Green Peppers, Onions in medium saucepot.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer uncovered, 20 minutes.* Serve, if desired with shredded Cheddar cheese and sour cream.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) bag Birds Eye Recipe Ready Chopped Green Peppers & Onions
1 (15.5 ounce) can red kidney beans, rinsed and drained
